title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Wednesday 16 September 2015 - BBC News
summary: passengers travelling on east midlands trains will have their fares frozen for the next two years .
lee dickson said being named saints captain made his sons 'happy ' .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 on thursday .

documents.title: our live coverage through the day
text: that 's it for today but local live will be back tomorrow with all the latest news , weather , sport and travel for northampton from 08:00 .

documents.title: new os map covers for northamptonshire taken by public
text: the newest ordnance survey map covers for northamptonshire have been released and there is something of a theme to them
the were chosen from a competition inviting the public to put their on the map .
the winners were peter jones of peterborough ( left ) , bob purser of northampton ( middle ) and ruth purser of northampton ( right ) .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: performance of 'the frozen tribute ' in northampton cancelled
text: the deco theatre in northampton have said a performance of 'the frozen tribute ' planned for saturday has been cancelled .
the theatre says it has contacted most customers , but any with tickets who have n't heard from them are asked to get in touch .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: budapest train station migrant camp 'an attack on the senses '
text: dr saneeya qureshi from the university of northampton has been to budapest station and seen the refugee problems there for herself .
she described what she saw when she exited the station
lots of tents , lots of people , lots of children just sitting around .
it was an attack on the senses in every way . ''
author: BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northants herald & post : stalls to be removed to boost wellingborough market
text: fourteen stalls leading up to wellingborough market are to be removed in a bid to improve the facility 's layout and boost trade .

documents.title: responding to your 999 calls : a guide
text: ever wondered how the response to a 999 call is decided on ?
northants fire has just tweeted the following helpful diagram

documents.title: evening weather : rain , rain , rain
text: it will be rather cloudy with outbreaks of persistent , and sometimes heavy , rain , but this will turn light and patchy overnight , becoming dry with clear spells later .
light to moderate north or northwesterly winds , with temperatures dropping to 9c ( 48f ) .
many areas will be dry tomorrow with bright or sunny spells , but thicker patches of cloud may bring the odd light shower in the afternoon .
temperatures reaching highs of 17c ( 63f ) .
author: Dan Holley
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: new saints captain dickson : 'i 'm a chatty person on and off the pitch '
text: lee dickson has been speaking to me about his new role as northampton saints captain for the upcoming season
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

text: the inside lane is closed and there is slow traffic due to a broken down lorry on the a14 westbound between junction 1 ( welford ) and catthorpe .

no chance of getting back on at wantage rd , day done # countycricketlive

documents.title: missing beryl found
text: earlier northamptonshire police said they were looking for an 81-year-old dementia sufferer called beryl .
there 's been some good news in the last few minutes - she 's been found
missing female from wellingborough , has now been found .
thanks all for your help
@ twitterid great news .

documents.title: your comments : overstone hall
text: overstone hall has been named by the victorian society as one the top ten endangered victorian or edwardian buildings in the uk and you 've been having you 're say
ann writes on facebook : `` it was an unpleasant mongrel of a building to start with .
wrong house in the wrong place , and its never shown and long term utility .
time to let it go and build something graceful and amazing . ''
but josie writes : `` yes i think its worth saving because it is a beautiful house and looks haunted besides all the history attached to it . ''
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: northampton shoe factory workers 'flipped out ' when they saw kinky boots
text: kinky boots director jerry mitchell told the bbc how he took his cast to tricker 's shoe factory in northampton to learn about the art of shoe-making .
`` when we started rehearsals i took the whole cast to tricker 's in northampton , and then all the tricker 's people came and saw a preview last week - and they flipped out . ''
author: Tim Masters
Arts and Entertainment correspondent

if seen please call .

beryl , 81years .

documents.title: new saints captain lee dickson hopes to 'make right decision ' on the pitch
text: lee dickson has told me he wo n't change his game now he 's captain : `` i 'm a rugby player first and foremost . ''
but he did reveal he might slow down when there are breaks in play .
it 's not being 100 mile per hour all the time .
it 's making sure when we have a penalty , calm things down , kick the points , or kick for the corner , consult people on the pitch and make the right decision . ''
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: being named captain made dickson 's sons 'happy '
text: i 've been down at franklin 's gardens where i caught up with lee dickson , who has been named the new saints captain , taking over from dylan hartley .
it 's a lovely feeling .
i ca n't wait for it and it 's an honour to lead them out .
my little boys were very happy at home , but as a captain nothing needs to change because we have so many leaders in the changing room . ''
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: afternoon headlines : midland mainline discussed in westminster royal visit to northamptonshire
text: here what we are looking at :
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northants bowler olly stone in england performance squad
text: northamptonshire fast bowler , olly stone , has been selected in the england performance programme , due to train at the national cricket performance centre in loughborough .
he will then go to the fast bowlers camp in south africa and the united arab emirates
david willey , who will be leaving northamptonshire at the end of the season , has been in the england lions squad to face pakistan 'a ' in december 's t20 matches .
author: Alex Winter
BBC Radio Northampton Sport

documents.title: fares frozen from kettering , wellingborough and corby
text: part of the deal that sees stagecoach continuing to run trains from london st pancras to northamptonshire until march 2018 , will see fares frozen on east midlands trains for the next two years .
this freeze on fares is in addition to the government 's cap on any rail fare increase above inflation for the next five years to ensure any rail fares are appropriately priced for the public . ''
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: unemployment falls in east midlands
text: in the east midlands region , which includes northamptonshire .
the jobless total fell by 4,000 to 114,000 , an drop of 4.7 % .
nationally , unemployment edged up by about 10,000 compared with the previous quarter to 1.82 million .
the unemployment rate was 5.5 % .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: kinky boots gets 'blistering ' reviews as it opens in west end
text: kinky boots , a musical based on the true story of a shoe factory in northampton , has opened in london 's west end to strong reviews .
the guardian said it `` puts its best foot forward '' while the mail hailed it as `` blistering ! ''
already a hit on broadway , kinky boots features songs from pop star cyndi lauper who won the 2013 tony award for best original score for her work .
author: Tim Masters
Arts and Entertainment correspondent

documents.title: refurbished pitch at west glebe park
text: corby borough council officially opened the newly-refurbished 3g artificial pitch at west glebe park pavilion last night .
the £ 41,000 refurbishment was completed in august , replacing the sand-based pitch with a 3g rubber crumb pitch .
hellenic fc juniors were the first to try it out .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: corbyn singing national anthem 'would be hypocritical ' , says academic
text: dr drew gray , senior lecturer in history at university of northampton , has written about jeremy corbyn 's decision not to sing the national anthem at the battle of britain commemorations , which dominated today 's front pages .
in the blog post dr gray looks at the history of the anthem , and asked whether mr corbyn was wrong not to sing it .
personally i think mr corbyn is a principled individual , and so he should follow his own counsel here .
he said he respected the anthem by standing during it but he is a republican and it would have been hypocritical of him to sing 'god save the queen ' .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: royal visit to northamptonshire
text: the duke of gloucester is in the county today to visit rapeseed oil producer duncan farrington in hargrave , and has also been taking in the canal as well
duke of gloucester takes a trip from gayton on a charity boat that provides free trips for disadvantaged people .

documents.title: daventry express : kilsby 'yarn-bombed ' by wi knitters
text: members of kilsby wi have been busy knitting so they can `` yarn bomb '' their village to celebrate the centenary of the women 's institute .

documents.title: northamptonshire 'forgotten about ' with infrastructure spending
text: aside from prime minster 's question time , there has been a debate in westminster hall on the uncertainty over the midland mainline between northamptonshire and london st pancras , after the project to electrify the line was paused .
the conservative mp for wellingborough peter bone said the region was often overlooked
because we are in the east midlands we are always forgotten about and we have one of the lowest amounts of public expenditure per head of population in the whole country . ''
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: bad light stops play at county ground : is the rain coming ?
text: bad light stops play !
northants are 75-2 ( 17.2 ) wakely 34 , keogh 17 trailing by 158 runs .
# norvgla

text: shock at rest day return following tornado

documents.title: northamptonshire looking to pile on runs before it rains
text: it 's taken three days , but we 've finally had an uninterrupted session in northamptonshire 's game against glamorgan .
the county is resuming after lunch on 52-2 .
glamorgan were dismissed for 233 with olly stone claiming all three wickets this morning .
there is full commentary online .
author: Alex Winter
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: overstone hall an 'utter failure ' when built
text: listed by the victorian society as one of their top ten endangered buildings , overstone hall was commissioned in 1860 by lady overstone , but she did n't survive to see it completed .
lord overstone hated the house and remarked in a letter to a friend : 'the new house , i regret to say , is a cause of unmitigated disappointment and vexation .
it is an utter failure . ''
the hall itself is very big with 114 rooms and 50 acres of grounds , but a fire ravaged the upper floors in 2001 , and it has been on for sale , for £ 1m , since 2010 .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: tom pursglove tries pmqs corbyn joke
text: corby mp tom pursglove attempted a little jeremy corbyn joke during pmqs - we 'll let you make your own mind up about its success
david cameron 's reply ?
he says since mr pursglove 's election , he has `` been feeling a sense of corbymania . ''
the prime minister has a lot to be pleased with corby for , and that 's corby not corbyn . ''

documents.title: corbyn has first prime minister 's question time
text: today jeremy corbyn had his first prime minister 's question time as leader of the labour party , and it seems , according to the former labour mp for corby it was honours even .
corbyn 's ernest style is quite effective but cameron has found the right tone for the occasion too # pmqs
@ twitterid although your successor just made a bit of a twat of himself
@ twitterid ha
@ twitterid i thought glimpses into lives of real people through questions was very powerful .

documents.title: where is the rain ?
text: earlier this morning it was predicted heavy rain , for which the met office has issued a 'yellow ' warning , was going to hit northamptonshire at midday .
that prediction has now been adjusted until 15:00 .
this is the latest radar image from the met office , and you can see the wet stuff is on its way .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: northampton saints hold pre-season press day
text: i am heading down to franklin 's gardens for northampton saints ' press day ahead of the new season .
hopefully i 'll be able to speak to director of rugby jim mallinder , and also the new saints captain lee dickson .
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

meschede with the early breakthrough .
northants 0-1 ( 0.2 ) wakely the new man in .

documents.title: kinky boots opens in london with northamptonshire support
text: last night , kinky boots the musical started its uk run at the adelphi theatre in london .
to celebrate the county 's still thriving footwear industry , a specially commissioned framed print was presented to the cast by northamptonshire enterprise partnership .
the musical is based on the 2005 film about a northampton shoe factory diversifying into high-heeled shoes .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: glamorgan all out for 233
text: wicket : lloyd goes for a battling 92 !
stone ends up with 4 .
glamorgan all out for 233 ( 52.2 ) kleinveldt 5-83 , stone 4-73 .
# norvgla

documents.title: stone strikes for northants
text: wicket : stone has his second !
penrhyn-jones edges to slip for 17 .
glamorgan now 232-8 ( 50.3 ) # norvgla

documents.title: northamptonshire telegraph : county residents touch down at spain 's 'ghost airport '
text: a number of northamptonshire families have been celebrating at the opening of an airport on spain 's mediterranean coast .

documents.title: east midlands trains announce £ 13m of investments
text: the government has revealed stagecoach , which runs east midlands trains , will operate on the midland mainline through northamptonshire until at least march 2018 .
the operator said it will make £ 13m worth of investments , including more cleaning and frontline staff .
it also said it will speed up the time it takes to get refunds and improve internet connections onboard trains .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: university of northampton researcher helps budapest refugees
text: dr saneeya qureshi , a researcher at the university of northampton , has written about her time volunteering at keleti train station in budapest , hungary , where many of refugees are camped .
dr qureshi says she was often in tears and described the refugees as `` amazing and inspiring human beings '' .
she also recorded this video
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: early breakthrough for northants
text: wicket : stone has the early breakthrough !
salter can only glove a good bouncer to the man close in , and he goes for 11 .
glamorgan 194-7 ( 41 ) .

documents.title: east midlands trains to run from corby , kettering and wellingborough until 2018
text: rail minister claire perry has said the government has reached agreement with stagecoach , which runs east midlands trains , to continue operating services on the east midlands franchise from london st pancras international to northamptonshire until 2018 .
this comes as there is a meeting in parliament today about the electrification of the midland line , after work was paused earlier this year .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: overstone hall owners want to sell it , but are working to protect site
text: earlier this year daventry district council obtained a court order requiring overstone hall 's current owners , the new testament church of god , to secure the site due to the risks it poses to public safety .
the church has been trying to sell the hall , which is one of the top ten most endangered victorian or edwardian buildings in the uk , for £ 1m .

in a statement , the church said it is working to secure the building , with `` work due to commence on the site next week with the erection of pallasade fencing as the initial phase to protect the site . ''
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: weather warning for northamptonshire today
text: there is a 'yellow ' weather warning for the county today with heavy rain expected to spread from south to north .
we expect the rain to hit around 13:00 , and there could be some localised flooding and lightning .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: morning headlines : stagecoach to continue on midland mainline overstone hall to be 'protected '
text: here 's what we are looking at :
author: Andrew Radd
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northamptonshire looking for more wickets in between the rain
text: it was another wet , gloomy day at wantage road yesterday for northamptonshire 's final home game of the season , but there was enough play for rory kleinveldt to up five wickets as glamorgan reached 166-6 .
the south african has 5-53 so far , the other wicket falling to ollie stone .
play resumes today , weather permitting , at 10:30 with full commentary online - northants remain confident for now
sunshine is a welcome site over the county ground this morning .
play is due to start on time at 10:30am .
# norvgla
author: Alex Winter
BBC Radio Northampton Sport

documents.title: fire at brackmills on a45 is in bus engine compartment
text: looking at the cctv we can see it 's lane one of the slip road that is closed on the a45 eastbound at brackmills , and the fire service has just tweeted this
incident 16/09/15 09:23 fire in engine compartment of bus - # a45 eastbound brackmills to barnes meadow
author: BBC Travel

text: coach fire a45 eastbound .
exit slip for brackmills is currently closed folks .
@ twitterid coach catches fire .
passengers alight sorry , i 'll be quiet now .

documents.title: northampton chronicle & echo : council loses bid to buy former northampton club
text: a borough council bid to buy a former club near the demolished greyfriars bus station and market the site for development has failed after the authority was outbid at auction .

documents.title: overstone hall has 'possibilities ' despite run down state
text: overstone hall , near northampton , is in the victorian society 's top ten endangered victorian and edwardian buildings .
they say there is potential for someone to regenerate the building which was damaged by fire in 2001 .
you 've got land with the building which might unlock possibilities in terms of enabling development , there is a lot that can be done here . ''
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: northampton town wo n't appeal taylor red card
text: cobblers manager chris wilder has five players out through injury for the trip to morecombe on saturday , but he told bbc radio northampton he will not be appealing jason taylor 's red card against oxford united .

he 's been a bit unlucky because the lad has run across him , he 's tried to block him off , it 's a contact sport , but he 's caught him and the lads gone down so easy and he 's right in the line of the referee , so it 's just not worth making an appeal because there 's no way that 'll get overturned . ''
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: spirit of corby voting closes today
text: voting closes later in the spirit of corby awards which recognises people from the town in categories , including contribution to the arts and the environment .
online voting ends at midday today with the award-winners announced at ceremony on friday night .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: midland mainline meeting to address electrification issue
text: the midland mainline serves wellingborough , kettering and corby and electrification of the line is seen as important to the economy , but shortly after the general election the government paused the project , saying it had gone over-budget .
today 's meeting in parliament of mps , councils and businesses , is hoping to reinforce the case for the project and get it re-started .
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: overstone hall in top ten 'endangered ' buildings
text: the victorian society says overstone hall near northampton is one of the most endangered victorian and edwardian buildings in the country .
built in the 1860s , around half of the building is a burnt out shell after a fire in 2001 .
the current owners , the new testament church of god , have been trying to sell it for the past five years , but today the victorian society is urging them do more to ensure the building survives .
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: headlines : overstone hall 'endangered ' midland mainline electrification meeting
text: here are our top stories :
author: Andrew Radd
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: weather : heavy rain later
text: it will be mostly dry and bright at first , but cloud will be thickening through the morning with outbreaks of rain , heavy at times , spreading in during the afternoon and evening .
top temperature of just 14c ( 57f ) .
you can see my full forecast on the bbc look east facebook page .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: good morning and welcome to local live for northamptonshire
text: make sure you 've got your waterproofs on today , it could be a wet one .
rain aside , between now and 18:00 we 'll be bringing you the latest news , sport and travel for northamptonshire from the bbc newsroom in northampton .
if you want to get in touch then you can email me , tweet us , or head to facebook .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live
